import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import './mobile.css'; import { get_data } from '../common/common_modules'; import { Table, Button, Icon, Modal, Loader, Dimmer } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import './mobile_disp.css'; class Screen extends React.Component { settings_window = (window) => { this.props.set_active_window(window); } render() { let SendPhoneList = this.props.store.disp.data.SendPhone.split(',');// для нескольких телефонов let RecPhoneList = this.props.store.disp.data.RecPhone.split(',');// для нескольких телефонов return (

) } }; export default connect( state => ({ store: state }), dispatch => ({ set_active_window: (param) => { dispatch({ type: 'set_active_window', payload: param }); }, }) )(Screen);
